contentList.content: Ring of Golden Recovery
This ring will recover any spellslot. For the right price in gold, of course.

A powerful warmage possessed a ring that symbolized his supremacy in magic, and brought him immense wealth. It is said that his riches were both the source of his magical power and a curse that forced him to seek treasure at all costs. His obsession with accumulating wealth led to a devastating war, and his disastrous downfall became legendary.
Golden Recovery
Recovers one spent spellslot of any level, using gold. If you don't have enough, you will be indebted to it, and each time you cast a spell it will try to get your money until the debt is closed.
Speak with ring
Ask the ring how many coins you still owe it. Even just by talking it will try to take coins to close the debt!
